alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 10:04PM CDT until October 03 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. Tides running around 1 to 1.5 feet above predicted astronomical tide levels. * WHERE...In Louisiana, West Cameron, East Cameron, Southern Calcasieu, Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary Parishes. In Texas, Lower Jefferson and Southern Orange Counties. * WHEN...During the time of astronomical high tide through noon CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Southern Calcasieu; West Cameron
